title: Leaver buster backfire? Need attention from Riot MOD. Thanks
body:
So mid (velk) was afk and we wanted to do the right thing and remake. I ended up losing LP aswell..? Can a Riot mod rectify this issue please. 

Thanks. {{champion:90}}

replies.body:
As to why you lost LP, if you afk as well to wait out the remake then you are flagged and will be penalised as well. It's to prevent people waiting around for the remake, only to have the afk/dc rejoin and then have the whole team behind. That said I'm uncertain how this works when the afk is on the enemy team, but given everyone else has CS and you don't it makes me think that was what happened.

Otherwise [submit a ticket to player support](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the screenshot and ask them why, they should be able to tell you.

The Vel has "Leave" in his op.gg match history, so clearly the API knows whats up. More than likely he did lose LP for it and it's just a visual bug in the official match history (I'm not sure the official match history has a precedent for remakes, like it does for Loss Forgiven which is Yellow).

Fair call, except I did buy some items and made my way to jungle. 

Thanks though
It's not a big deal, you know now. GL on the rift :)
yep that's a bug, hopefully a wrench man or rioter sees this.
Turns out the Velk actually won aswell {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
